attributes.action: undertake an immediate grand-scale building project in order to redress the demand-supply imbalance that has led to massively inflated property prices.   In addition, place a special high-rate tax on income derived from buy-to-rent properties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Housing is a basic economic necessity that has become completely unaffordable for the vast majority of first time buyers.

The only beneficiaries of these high prices are banks who make massive profits on the interest payments of extremely large loans and the tiny minority of people who sell up and move either to a cheaper area of the UK or another country with less ridiculous property prices.
 
Like all markets, demand-supply rules apply so it is necessary for the government to build large amounts of good quality housing and to increase disincentives for those who buy-to-rent.
